analysis: The documents all pertain to the establishment and function of various advisory councils and commissions. These councils are created to address specific issues, ranging from national research and judicial nominations to nutrition monitoring, support for the arts, water resources, juvenile delinquency, Olympic sports, mental health, small businesses, and coal usage. The commissions are typically composed of experts and stakeholders, tasked with studying problems, providing advice, and recommending policies to the President and relevant government agencies.
title: Presidential Advisory Commissions on National Issues
